title: Drawing, "Design for clock", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, red watercolor, black wash, graphite, on cream laid paper
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Clock sits on footed base, lower front panel shows relief scene of Cupid ferrying Chronos, bow of boat is swan-shaped. Clock at right, with wreath, bowl and box above. At left, a woman holding flowers, gazing in a mirror.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for clock", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, red watercolor, black wash, graphite, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-71-9.
